OUTSIDE_DINER.long_desc: You are standing on the sidewalk outside a modern storefront with rakish white lines and curved glass. Above your head, massive pink letters spell out DINER. Attractive yellow, red, and blue flowers are growing in pots on the sidewalk, and there is a white streetlamp beside the diner door. The street continues to the east and west, and there is a large park to the south.
OUTSIDE_DINER.south: You start to cross the street to the park but notice there is no crosswalk and return to the safety of the sidewalk.

DINER_INTERIOR.long_desc: You are inside the diner, a 2020 take on 1950s retro chic. The black and white tile floor is freshly polished, and red booths line the walls. A lunch counter with barstools separates the kitchen area from the main dining area. A door leads out to the street. A candyapple-red jukebox sits gleaming against the back wall.

DINER_CORNER.long_desc: You are standing at the corner of the diner's block. You can see the diner's interior through a large, curved window. Attractive yellow and red flowers are growing in pots on the sidewalk. The street continues to the east and west, and there is a large park to the south. A narrow set of stairs lead up to the businesses above the diner.
DINER_CORNER.south: You start to cross the street to the park but notice there is no crosswalk and return to the safety of the sidewalk.

OUTSIDE_BOXING_GYM.long_desc: You are on the second floor landing of the building above the diner. Narrow stairs lead down to the street, and a spiral staircase leads to another level above. There is a door east to what looks like a boxing gym.

OUTSIDE_RECORDING_STUDIO.long_desc: You are on the third floor landing of the building above the diner. A spiral staircase leads back down to the landing below. There is a doorway south that leads into a recording studio.

BOXING_GYM.long_desc: You are inside a boxing gym, rigged up with the latest equipment including a really inviting-looking punching bag. A doorway west leads back out to the landing.

RECORDING_STUDIO.long_desc: You are inside a recording studio. A door to the north leads back out to the landing.
